mapper.select: SELECT follow_major.id as id, major.id as majorId, major.name as majorName FROM follow_major,major,user WHERE follow_major.user_id=user.id AND follow_major.major_id=major.id AND user.code=#{code}
SELECT follow_major.id as id FROM follow_major, user WHERE follow_major.major_id=#{majorId} AND user.id=follow_major.user_id AND user.code=#{code}
INSERT INTO follow_major(user_id, major_id) VALUES((SELECT id FROM user WHERE code=#{code}),#{majorId})
DELETE FROM follow_major WHERE user_id IN (SELECT id FROM user WHERE code=#{code}) AND major_id IN (SELECT id FROM major WHERE college_id=#{collegeId})
